channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Our tech editors favorite earbuds are $77 off at Amazon for Cyber Monday
item.description: The Technics AZ100 earbuds blew us away, and now you can get them for 26% off this Black Friday.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 30, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for November 30, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for November 30, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for November 30, 2025
item.description: The NYT Strands hints and answers you need to make the most of your puzzling experience.

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for November 30, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1624 on November 30 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.

item.title: Hurdle hints and answers for November 30, 2025
item.description: Hints and answers to today's Hurdle all in one place.

item.title: Silent Hill f is one of the best games of 2025, and its on sale for Black Friday
item.description: "Silent Hill f" was released in September and is one of the best games of this year, if not the best horror game of 2025. Get it on sale as an Amazon Black Friday deal.

item.title: 10+ fun stocking stuffer ideas still on sale after Black Friday: Self-care, card games, more
item.description: Need a small gift idea? We found some good stocking stuffers on sale at Amazon, from the Laneige Lip Mask to a Rubik's Cube.

item.title: Black Friday 2025: Live updates on the deals still live from Amazon, Target, Walmart, and more
item.description: Get live updates on Black Friday sales. We found savings of $150 on Dyson Supersonic hair dryers, $300 off Samsung TVs, and record prices on AirPods.

item.title: Im a pet owner, and these are the best Black Friday air purifier deals to snatch up before theyre gone
item.description: I’ve found the best air purifier Black Friday deals that are running into the Cyber Weekend.

item.title: Expert-picked Black Friday deals still live: We found record prices on AirPods, Kindles, Lego, and PS5 consoles
item.description: The best Black Friday deals of 2025 let you save $250 on MacBooks, 27% on Kindles, and 55% on Amazon devices. See the latest deals as Cyber Monday approaches.
